raw akas.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
Hotels zum Staunen - Ein Blick hinter die Kulissen

akas: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (original title)
Hotels zum Staunen - Ein Blick hinter die Kulissen Germany
akas from release info: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (original title)
Hotels zum Staunen - Ein Blick hinter die Kulissen Germany

1.title: The Brando, French Polynesia

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Giles Coren and Monica Galetti fly to the island of Tetiaroa in French Polynesia to work in one of the world's most luxurious eco-resorts. The Brando was the brainchild of Hollywood star Marlon Brando.

2.title: Anantara Al Jabal Al Akhdar, Oman

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Giles and Monica learn about some of the challenges of building the highest 5-star hotel in the Middle East. Monica meets one of the few female Omani members of staff and Giles plays cricket.

3.title: Grand Resort Bad Ragaz, Switzerland

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Monica and Giles travel to the foothills of the Swiss Alps to visit this luxury spa hotel that also offers guests sleep therapy, Olympic-standard sports facilities and even surgery.

4.title: Ashford Castle, Ireland

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Giles and Monica hop over to the Republic of Ireland to learn about the troubled history of this 800-year-old castle turned luxury hotel, its ties with the local community and activities laid on for guests.

5.title: The Silo, South Africa

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Giles and Monica travel to South Africa to experience The Silo, an industrial-chic, luxury, art-themed hotel sitting in the former elevator shaft of a 90-year-old, 187-foot grain silo in the heart of Cape Town.

6.title: Hacienda Vira Vira, Chile

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Monica and Giles work in Hacienda Hotel Vira Vira, which overlooks an active volcano.

7.title: Christmas Special - St Moritz, Switzerland

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: In this Christmas Special, Giles and Monica visit Kulm Hotel in St. Moritz. The Swiss Alpine resort was the birthplace of winter tourism more than 150 years ago.

1.title: Marina Bay Sands, Singapore

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Giles and Monica join the 9,500 staff working at one of the world's largest hotels. As well as viewing some of the facilities on offer they go behind the scenes to see the parts of the hotel guests never see.

2.title: Mashpi Lodge, Ecuador

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Giles and Monica visit Mashpi Lodge in the Ecuadorian rainforest which features a gondola cable car to transport guests through the forest canopy. The pair learn how eco-tourism is saving endangered species.

3.title: Giraffe Manor, Kenya

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Giles and Monica discover a unique hotel in Kenya where giraffe, guests and staff all co-exist. They then visit the Sasaab Lodge a 6-acre plot set within 82,000 acres of land owned by the Samburu tribe who receive a fee for each guest.

4.title: Royal Mansour, Morocco

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Giles and Monica visit and go to work in the luxury hotel in Marrakesh, which was built by royal decree to showcase the region. Monica learns how to pleat the curtains while Giles dons the uniform of a butler.

5.title: Fogo Island Inn, Canada

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Giles and Monica visit the hotel sited off the northeast coast of Newfoundland. Housekeepers Cynthia and Lori rope Giles into a boat race while Monica learns the secret of growing the perfect potato.

6.title: Icehotel, Sweden

episode of.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Giles and Monica's final stop-off takes them 120 miles north of the Arctic Circle into Swedish Lapland. Giles joins the artists who craft the rooms from huge blocks of ice while Monica meets the hotel's 82-year-old reindeer-meat supplier.

imdb.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
plot: 'Giles Coren' (qv) and 'Monica Galetti' (qv) travel the globe visiting some of the world's most incredible hotels. They go beyond the lobby to see the areas that the public never see and roll up their sleeves to work alongside staff.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
